title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees in thousands, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Number of employees in thousands has decreased over the Year
Number of employees in thousands is roughly constant from 2005 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Number of employees in thousands about 333.0 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Number of employees in thousands about 283.0 was recorded at Year 2018
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees in thousands, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2010 to 2014.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2010.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2005 to 2007.
